2025-07-22T10:47:00.CONTENT_EN:
As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, some High Speed Rail train services on 22 Jul 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and GuangZhoudong have been cancelled due to equipment fault in the relevant Mainland section. 

Cancelled train service:
To GuangZhoudong: : G6568, G6556
To Hong Kong West Kowloon: G6565, G6553

For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or on the mobile app. Passengers may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. Passengers may also consider taking the East Rail Line to Lo Wu/ Lok Ma Chau or using other transport to enter the Mainland. 

For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and avoid coming to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. 
.
2025-07-22T10:47:00.CONTENT_CN:
內地鐵路單位通報，由於相關內地段有設備故障，2025年07月22日部分由香港西九龍站前往廣州東站的高速鐵路列車車次取消。

已取消的車次:
前往廣州東:G6568,G6556
前往香港西九龍:G6565,G6553

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。乘客亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。乘客可考慮乘搭東鐵綫經羅湖/落馬洲，或使用其他跨境交通工具前往內地。

如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。
。

2025-07-22T20:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-22T20:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。
